T02TD2508E:215b-0: @215b * // dkyil 'khor gyi thig gi cho ga bzhugs /
T02TD2508E:215b-2: # // dkyil 'khor gang yang thig gdab pa //
T02TD2508E:215b-3: sa gzhi cha mnyam 'thas byas la //
T02TD2508E:215b-4: tshangs chen la sogs thig chen brgyad//
T02TD2508E:216a-0: @216a * // shin tu 'grus med mnyam por gdab //
T02TD2508E:216a-1: phyogs re dkyil 'khor phyed cha la //
T02TD2508E:216a-2: re'u mig nyi shu bzhi bzhir bya //
T02TD2508E:216a-3: gcig pa sor gnyis tshang du bya //
T02TD2508E:216a-4: gnyis pa sgo khyud sor gnyis tshad //
T02TD2508E:216a-5: gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad du bya //
T02TD2508E:216a-6: bzhi pa sgo logs sor bzhi'i tshad //
T02TD2508E:216a-7: lnga pa sor gnyis nam mkha' ste //
T02TD2508E:216a-8: drug pa sor gnyis ka ba'o //
T02TD2508E:216a-9: bdun pa dang ni brgyad pa gnyis //
T02TD2508E:216a-10: de ni lha yi snam bu ste //
T02TD2508E:216a-11: sor brgyad pa yi tshad du bya //
T02TD2508E:216a-12: dgu pa sor gnyis sgo ngos te //
T02TD2508E:216a-13: bcu pa sor bzhi gar mkhan no //
T02TD2508E:216a-14: bcu gcig pa yi sor gnyis ni //
T02TD2508E:216a-16: bcu gnyis sor bzhi dra phyed ste //
T02TD2508E:216a-17: bcu gsum pa yi sor gnyis ni //
T02TD2508E:216a-18: mnga' yab dang ni pha gu la //
T02TD2508E:216a-19: bcu bzhi pa yi sor bzhi ni //
T02TD2508E:216a-20: de ni nam mkha' stong pa'o //
T02TD2508E:216a-21: bco lnga bcu drug bcu bdun pa //
T02TD2508E:216a-22: bco brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa //
T02TD2508E:216a-23: de bzhin nyi shu pa rnams ni //
T02TD2508E:216a-24: sor ni gnyis gnyis tshad du bya ;
T02TD2508E:216a-25: / bzhi cha yi ni cha ru 'dod //
T02TD2508E:216a-26: gcig ni karma shi ri ste //
T02TD2508E:216a-27: gcig ni padma'i cha yin no //
T02TD2508E:216a-28: nyi shu gcig pa sor brgyad tshad //
T02TD2508E:216a-29: 'khor lo dang ni gdugs su bya //
T02TD2508E:216a-30: nyi shu gnyis pa gsum pa dang //
T02TD2508E:216a-31: de bzhin du ni bzhi pa rnams //
T02TD2508E:216a-32: sor ni bzhi bzhi'i tshad du 'dod //
T02TD2508E:216a-34: rdo rje ra ba med 'od do //
T02TD2508E:216a-35: slob dpon dharma k'i rtis mdzad pa'i thig gi cho ga rdzogs so//
